emailTaken: You e-mail address is already in use. Have you previously done mooc.fi courses?
emailNoAt: There is no '@' -sign in the e-mail address.
emailNoPoint: There is no '.' in the e-mail address.
formInfoText: Here you can create a new account which works on most mooc.fi courses and services. If you have participated in mooc.fi courses before, you can use your existing account on login page.
signIn: Already have an account? Log in.
confirmEmailTitle: Your Mooc.fi account has been created.
confirmEmailInfo: We have sent an confirmation e-mail to your e-mail address. Please check your e-mail and confirm the address.
errorResearchSubmit: There was an error saving your answer. You can change it in your profile later.
formInfoHYHakaRegister: Please check that the following information is correct.
formInfoNoTMC: Looks like you do not have a TMC account associated with the e-mail address {{email}}. Please enter a password and confirm it and we will create the account for you.
verify-user: A user with email {{email}} already exists, but is not connected to this organization. Please connect the user with the organization.
token-issue: We have created an account for you, but there was an issue when logging you in. Please try again later.
already-registered: A user with email {{email}} already exists, and is connected to this organization. Please log in.
generic-error: There was an issue while registering. Please try again later.
